item.title: What's with my cases...this is really making me annoyed
item.dc:creator: @Miss_Doctor Miss_Doctor
item.description:
@Miss_Doctor wrote:

I really need help. I can’t making fishing spots, I can’t make portals, I can’t make anything do anything. Yes, with the source, there were “cases” that worked. The only problem here, is whenever I add a case to make an object do something, it doesn’t work. The object won’t do anything. What’s going on…Here’s an example of my code for fishing. I’ve tried many different objects, none work.

case 2029: if(playerHasItem(303) == true && playerLevel[10] >= 10 && actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("You catch a fish."); actionTimer = 70; setAnimation(619); addSkillXP((6000*playerLevel[10]), 10); if (playerLevel[10] <= 9) addItem(335, 1); if (playerLevel[10] >= 10) addItem(331, 1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; deleteItem(314, GetItemSlot(314), 1); } else if(playerHasItem(309) == false) { sendMessage("Get a fly fishing rod!!"); } else if(playerHasItem(314) == false) { sendMessage("Get some feathers!!"); } else if(playerLevel[10] <= 10) { sendMessage("You need a fishing level of 10 to fish here."); } else if(actionTimer > 0) { sendMessage("Wait.. god damnit."); } break;

Read full topic
item.source: What's with my cases...this is really making me annoyed
